column4: hey guys, is there any fix available to this "unable to enumerate usb" bug even now? this has been bugging me for a half a year at least, and it seems that in ubuntu bugs it is still not resolved
well, my dmesg does no reaction when I plug my mobile phone in and also the phone does not recognize that it has been plugged in
and on previous lines of dmesg there is this unable to enumerate blaah
